command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user PDbr8XrQDBL7gch.root --database iAmwvqxbN2keKvYUSqkQh2 --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE users;
stdout:
Table	Create Table
users	CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `name` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `email` varchar(320) DEFAULT NULL,
  `loginMethod` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL,
  `role` enum('user','admin') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastSignedIn` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin
